text: 5,500-year-old DNA shows syphilis was rooted in the Americas, before Columbus - The Washington Post

text: After ‘good’ Trump meeting, Zelensky pushes Europe hard to do more - The Washington Post

text: Scientists discover new clue linking obesity to dementia risk - The Washington Post

text: ICE memo allows agents to enter homes without judge’s warrant, legal group says - The Washington Post

fullText: Mexican authorities have arrested an alleged organized crime figure in Michoacan linked to the killing of a lime growers' leader. Security Secretary Omar García Harfuch said the man known as “El Botox” was arrested for extorting lime growers and various homic…

text: A vaccine trial is called 'unethical' and a 'unique' opportunity. Is it on or off? - NPR
fullText: The U.S. is giving $1.6 million to researchers to study how the hepatitis B vaccine affects newborns in Guinea-Bissau. Local officials say the trial is suspended. U.S. officials say that's inaccurate.

text: FTX Exec Caroline Ellison Is Now a Free Woman - Business Insider
fullText: Caroline Ellison, the former Alameda Research CEO, was freed this week after spending about 14 months of her two-year sentence in federal custody.

text: Newsom shows off knee pads for CEOs 'selling out' to the Trump administration - CNBC
